mapper.select: SELECT T .category_id, T .category_name, SUM (T .duration) duration FROM ( SELECT t2. ID, t3.category_id, t4.category_name, COALESCE (t2.duration, 0) * COALESCE (t3.apportion_rate, 0) / 100 duration FROM t_okr_task t1 LEFT JOIN t_okr_daily t2 ON t1. ID = t2.task_id AND to_char(t2.report_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #{condition.reportStartDateStr} AND to_char(t2.report_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #{condition.reportEndDateStr} LEFT JOIN t_okr_task_apportion t3 ON t1. ID = t3.task_id LEFT JOIN t_okr_apportion_category t4 ON t3.category_id = t4. ID WHERE t2. ID IS NOT NULL AND t1.belong_team = #{condition.teamId} AND t3.category_id IS NOT NULL AND t3.category_id != '' ) T GROUP BY T .category_id, T .category_name

SELECT t1. ID org_id, t1. NAME org_name, COALESCE(COUNT (DISTINCT t2. ID),0) org_user_num, COALESCE ( SUM ( t3.duration ), 0 ) duration FROM t_okr_sys_organization t1 INNER JOIN t_okr_sys_user t2 ON t1. ID = t2.organization_id LEFT JOIN t_okr_daily t3 ON t3.report_user_id = t2. ID AND to_char(t3.report_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #{condition.reportStartDateStr} AND to_char(t3.report_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #{condition.reportEndDateStr} LEFT JOIN t_okr_task t4 ON t4. ID = t3.task_id WHERE t4.belong_team = #{condition.teamId} GROUP BY t1. ID ORDER BY duration DESC

SELECT T .category_id, T .category_name, SUM (T .duration) duration FROM ( SELECT t3. ID, t5.category_id, t6.category_name, COALESCE (t3.duration, 0) * COALESCE (t5.apportion_rate, 0) / 100 duration FROM t_okr_sys_organization t1 INNER JOIN t_okr_sys_user t2 ON t1. ID = t2.organization_id LEFT JOIN t_okr_daily t3 ON t3.report_user_id = t2. ID AND to_char(t3.report_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #{condition.reportStartDateStr} AND to_char(t3.report_day, 'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #{condition.reportEndDateStr} LEFT JOIN t_okr_task t4 ON t4. ID = t3.task_id LEFT JOIN t_okr_task_apportion t5 ON t4. ID = t5.task_id LEFT JOIN t_okr_apportion_category t6 ON t5.category_id = t6. ID WHERE t3. ID IS NOT NULL AND t4.belong_team = #{condition.teamId} AND t5.category_id IS NOT NULL AND t5.category_id != '' ) T GROUP BY T .category_id, T .category_name
